title: Delete S3 image only when Windows test is successful
body_html: Currently when a test fails on Windows CI, there is no way to recover the workspace for debugging because the image is already deleted before the tests are run. This diff moves the delete image step to be after sh run_test.sh so that only successful test jobs will have their images cleaned up.
body_text: Currently when a test fails on Windows CI, there is no way to recover the workspace for debugging because the image is already deleted before the tests are run. This diff moves the delete image step to be after sh run_test.sh so that only successful test jobs will have their images cleaned up.
body: Currently when a test fails on Windows CI, there is no way to recover the workspace for debugging because the image is already deleted before the tests are run. This diff moves the delete image step to be after `sh run_test.sh` so that only successful test jobs will have their images cleaned up.
